column4: UPDATE 1-Samsung to launch AI assistant service for Galaxy S8
column5: * Tech firms' competition on AI technology intensifying   (Updates with background on Samsung)

column4: Samsung to launch AI assistant service for Galaxy S8
column5: SEOUL  Nov 6 Samsung Electronics Co Ltd  said on Sunday it would launch an artificial intelligence digital assistant service for its upcoming Galaxy S8 smartphone  seeking to rebound from the Galaxy Note 7's collapse and differentiate its devices.
